sentences.sContent: Prices are governed by market demand.
sentences.sCn: 价格的高低取决于市场的需求。

sentences.sContent: All his decisions have been entirely governed by self-interest.
sentences.sCn: 他的所有决定都受利己之心的支配。

sentences.sContent: ...The state recognizes this in the large body of family laws that govern children' welfare...

words.tran: 有统治、控制或治理权力的
政府的；政治的；统治上的
可控制的；可支配的；可统治的
主管人员；统治者，管理者；[自] 调节器；地方长官
州长或总督等的职位；州长或总督等的任期

trans.tranOther: to control or influence sb/sth or how sth happens, functions, etc.
